title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 9, subtit. S, ch. II, pt. 1504 - Sprinkler Systems For Special Locations In Multiple Dwellings
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 9, subtit. S, ch. II, pt. 1504 - Sprinkler Systems For Special Locations In Multiple Dwellings

State Regulations
§ 1504.1 - General requirements
§ 1504.2 - Existing installations
§ 1504.3 - Water supply
§ 1504.4 - Piping systems
§ 1504.5 - Spacing of sprinkler heads
§ 1504.6 - Fire department connection
§ 1504.7 - Local water-flow alarm
§ 1504.8 - Identification
§ 1504.9 - Maintenance
§ 1504.10 - Standard for compliance

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 9, subtit. S, ch. II, pt. 1504

Statutory authority: Multiple Residence Law, §326

The provisions of this Part apply to sprinkler systems
consisting only of sprinkler heads and piping installed in special locations in
multiple dwellings. The requirements for complete sprinkler systems installed
throughout hotels and similar dwellings are covered in Part
1503. State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
